No tiny particles in water reduces natural cleaning, affecting water stay-clear power

Low cloudiness conditions reduce places for good germs to grow and help clean

High dirtiness hurts fish breathing parts with floating particles, blocking air exchange
Muddy water blocks cleaning systems, hurting quality and needing extra care
Dirt-filled water limits fish vision, affecting hunting, eating, and baby making
High cloudiness increases germ sickness risks and speeds up oxygen use

Floating dirt slows plant growing power, hurting oxygen output
